lem.advancement.config.root.name: Client Options
lem.battle.advancement.config.armorbar.d:
Don't show armor you are wearing

§6Can be toggled with /trigger armorbar
lem.advancement.config.custompack.desc:
Allow the usage of a Custom Resource Pack.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger maptextures set -2
lem.advancement.config.custompack.name: Custom Resources
lem.advancement.config.globalpack.desc:
Disable the per-map texture packs.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger maptextures
lem.advancement.config.globalpack.name: No per-map textures
lem.advancement.config.nohotbarswap.desc:
Disable hotbar item swapping. (When using a throwable or dropping an item, that slot will be refilled)

§6Can be toggled with /trigger hotbarswap
lem.advancement.config.nohotbarswap.name: Disabled Hotbar Item Swapping
lem.advancement.config.optifine.desc:
Use the optifine-compatible resource pack.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger optifinepack
lem.advancement.config.optifine.name: OptiFine Resources
lem.advancement.config.swaptipped.desc:
Ignore tipped arrows when using hotbarswapping.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger swaptipped
lem.advancement.config.swaptipped.name: No tipped arrows hotbar swap
lem.advancement.config.vtdarkmode.desc:
Use the dark mode inventory texture from VanillaTweaks for small inventory.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger darkinv
lem.advancement.config.vtdarkmode.name: VT Dark Small Inventory
lem.advancement.config.clearsmall.desc:
Don't use a texture for for small inventory.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger clearsmallinv
lem.advancement.config.clearsmall.name: Invisible Small Inventory
lem.advancement.root.name: Battle Achievements
lem.battle.advancement.cupid.desc: Kill 2 players in a round of a battle mini game using a bow and arrow.
lem.battle.advancement.cupid.name: Cupido
lem.battle.advancement.hunger.desc: Uccidi un giocatore mentre sei affamato in un round del minigioco Battaglia.
lem.battle.advancement.hunger.name: Morto di fame
lem.battle.advancement.master.desc: Win 3 battle games in a row.
lem.battle.advancement.master.name: ...è diventato maestro
lem.battle.advancement.mine.desc: Apri tutte le casse di un'arena in un round del minigioco Battaglia.
lem.battle.advancement.mine.name: Mio!
lem.battle.advancement.scratch.desc: Take 100 damage in a round of a battle mini game.
lem.battle.advancement.scratch.name: 'Tis but a scratch
lem.battle.advancement.student.desc: Vinci una partita del minigioco Battaglia.
lem.battle.advancement.student.name: Lo studente...
lem.config.custompack.enable:
§aCustom Pack enabled!
§6Please relog for changes to apply.

lem.config.heart.menu.patreon.linkmessag: Please consider supporting the server on %s:

lem.resource.reloadresource.customenable: You can not reload resources when you have a custom pack enabled!
lem.lobby.start.waiting: 1 or more additional players are required to start the round...
lem.mapdecider.vote.alreadyvoted: Hai già votato per questa mappa!
lem.battle.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdes: A world build deep in the Nether, with plenty of lava for your enemies to swim in!
Try to survive in this pirate's hidden camp, full of shipwrecks and caves!
This ancient looking underground structure is the perfect place to sneak up on your enemies!
Battle in the dragon's lair.
Don't look directly at her!
This mysterious temple is set within the deepest jungle. Watch out for enemies lurking in the tree tops
Deep beneath the ocean, a lost city lay in ruins. Atlantis awaits the battle.
Abandoned and left to ruin, there are still secrets left to be found. Battle for the remaining resources and survive this hazardous place.
Brave the enemy walls or defend the keep. The siege is upon us.
Crown yourself in glory in the Castle's great halls.
An alien attack has created a dangerous arena. Defend your rooftops but don't fall off!
A port in the sky away from the storm, but this area is anything but calm.
It's high noon! Things are about to get wild in the Old West, so grab a fistful of TNT, slap on a sou'wester and prepare for an almighty dustbowl dust-up between the good, the bad, and the ugly.
A snowbound excavation site lies deserted. What unspeakable things did the scientists discover beneath the ice? Find out for yourself, while battling against both the elements and each other!
Are you tiny or is everything else just really, really big? Be careful not to lose your sense of proportion as you fight your way across this over-sized bedroom and tidy up the competition.
Discover your inner self as you battle across this ancient land of dragons! This battle map is exclusive to the Chinese Mythology Mash Up.
Something wicked this way comes. Full of deadly thrills and sinister shocks, it will scare you off your Minecraft blocks!

Get together with friends and family for some Minecraft-style tussling in this special seasonal map. The more the merrier! Guaranteed to be more fun than pretending you like the socks your uncle gave you.
Face the perils of the General Atomics Galleria! Is Mister Handy friend or foe? Will you dodge the traps rigged to blow?
Battle through the troubled waters of Libertalia! Who will captain the seas in this watery graveyard of ships?
Clamber through the ruins of the Capitol! Who will rise from the rubble to battle their way through the wasteland?
lem.menu.host.title: Premi §6[%s§6]
